exec cuetils upsert upsert.cue a.json
cmp stdout golden.stdout

-- upsert.cue --
{
	a: {
		b: string
	}
	c: int
	d: "d"
	e: "E"
}
-- a.json --
{
	"a": {
		"b": "B"
	},
	"b": 1,
	"c": 2,
	"d": "D"
}

-- golden.stdout --
a.json
----------------------
{
	b: 1
	c: 2
	e: "E"
	a: {
		b: "B"
	}
	d: "d"
}
